mission.title: Our Mission

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We love what we do and it shows in every detail of our products.

users.title: User First

innovation.title: Innovation

quality.title: Quality

team.title: Our Team
team.content: We're a small but mighty team based in {{address.country}}, combining local insights with global perspectives to build apps that resonate with users worldwide.

meta.description: Learn how {{company.name}} collects, uses, and protects your personal information when using WiseNest.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content:
Your privacy is critically important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how {{company.name}} ("Company", "we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, discloses, and safeguards your information when you use WiseNest mobile application.

By using WiseNest, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. This policy complies with {{legal.dataProtectionLaw}} and international standards such as GDPR where applicable.

dataController.title: 2. Data Controller

informationWeCollect.title: 3. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect several types of information:
items: Account Information: Email, display name, profile picture (optional), and authentication data from social login providers (Google, Apple, Facebook).
Usage Data: Device information, app usage statistics, crash reports, and general location (country/region). We do NOT collect precise GPS location.
User Content: Food items, expiry dates, shopping lists, recipe preferences, and custom categories.
Payment Information: Subscription status and transaction IDs. Actual payment details are processed by Apple/Google.
Communications: Support emails and attachments you provide.

howWeUse.title: 4. How We Use Your Information
items: Service Delivery: Provide inventory tracking, expiry notifications, and recipe suggestions.
Sync and Backup: Synchronize data across devices for Premium users.
Notifications: Send expiry alerts and service announcements.
Personalization: Generate AI-powered recipe suggestions.
Improvement: Analyze usage patterns and develop new features.
Legal Compliance: Comply with applicable laws and regulations.

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your data based on:
items: Contract Performance: Processing necessary to provide requested services.
Legitimate Interests: Improving services, preventing fraud, ensuring security.
Consent: For optional features like marketing communications.
Legal Obligation: Compliance with applicable laws.

dataStorage.title: 6. Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content:
Your data is stored securely:

• Cloud Storage: Firebase (Google Cloud Platform) servers in US and Singapore.
• Encryption: TLS 1.3 in transit, AES-256 at rest.
• Access Controls: Only authorized personnel can access user data.
• Security Audits: Regular security assessments and vulnerability testing.

No method of transmission is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
items: Active Account: Data retained while your account is active.
Account Deletion: Personal data deleted within {{legal.dataRetentionDays}} days of request.
Backup Retention: Backups retained up to {{legal.backupRetentionDays}} days for disaster recovery.
Legal Requirements: Some data retained longer if required by law.
Anonymized Data: May be retained indefinitely for statistical analysis.

sharing.title: 8. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do NOT sell your personal information. We may share data with:
items: Service Providers: Firebase, RevenueCat, Sentry (bound by confidentiality agreements).
Analytics Partners: Google Analytics (anonymized data).
Legal Requirements: When required by law or court order.
Business Transfers: In event of merger or acquisition.
With Your Consent: When you explicitly consent.

internationalTransfer.title: 9. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfer.content: Your data may be transferred to countries outside {{address.country}} (US, Singapore). We ensure appropriate safeguards through Standard Contractual Clauses and data processing agreements.

yourRights.title: 10. Your Rights
items: Right to Access: Request a copy of your personal data.
Right to Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate data.
Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your data.
Right to Data Portability: Request data in machine-readable format.
Right to Restrict Processing: Limit how we use your data.
Right to Object: Object to processing for certain purposes.
Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent at any time.
Right to Lodge Complaint: File complaint with data protection authority.

exercisingRights.title: 11. Exercising Your Rights
exercisingRights.content:
Contact {{email.privacy}}. We respond within {{legal.privacyResponseDays}} days.

You can also:
• Export data through App settings
• Delete account through App settings
• Manage notification preferences
• Control permissions via device settings

children.title: 12. Children's Privacy
children.content: WiseNest is not intended for children under {{legal.minimumAge}} years. We do not knowingly collect information from children. Contact us immediately if you believe a child has provided personal information.

thirdPartyLinks.title: 13. Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our App may contain links to third-party services. We are not responsible for their privacy policies or practices.

cookies.title: 14. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content:
Our mobile App uses:
• Device Identifiers: For analytics
• Local Storage: App preferences and cached data
• Analytics SDKs: Firebase Analytics (anonymized)

Our website may use cookies for functionality and analytics.

changes.title: 15. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy. Material changes will be notified through in-app notification, email, or website notice. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: 16. Contact Us

meta.description: Read the Terms of Service for using WiseNest application by {{company.name}}.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By using WiseNest ("the App"), you agree to these Terms of Service, our Privacy Policy, and additional applicable terms. These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and {{company.name}}.

IF YOU DO NOT AGREE, DO NOT USE THE APP.

We may modify these Terms at any time. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.content:
To use WiseNest, you must:
• Be at least {{legal.minimumAge}} years old (or digital consent age in your jurisdiction)
• Have legal capacity to enter binding agreements
• Not be prohibited from using the App under applicable laws

description.title: 3. Description of Service
description.content:
WiseNest is a food and home inventory management app that helps users:
• Track food items and expiry dates
• Manage household inventory
• Receive expiry notifications
• Create shopping lists
• Discover recipes

The App is for personal, non-commercial use.

accounts.title: 4. User Accounts
accounts.content: By creating an account, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate and complete information
Maintain information accuracy
Maintain security of your credentials
Not share your credentials
Notify us of unauthorized access
Accept responsibility for all account activities

subscriptions.title: 5. Subscriptions and Payments
subscriptions.content:
Premium features are available through paid subscriptions:
• Billing through Apple App Store or Google Play Store
• Auto-renewal unless cancelled 24 hours before renewal date
• Prices may change with advance notice
• Refunds handled by app stores per their policies

freeTrial.title: 6. Free Trials
freeTrial.content:
Free trials may be offered:
• Eligibility determined by Apple/Google
• Subscription begins automatically if not cancelled
• Unused trial portions forfeited upon purchasing subscription

userContent.title: 7. User Content
userContent.content:
You retain ownership of content you create ("User Content").

You grant us a limited license to:
• Store, process, and display your content for service delivery
• Create backups
• Analyze anonymized data for improvements

You are solely responsible for your User Content.

prohibited.title: 8. Prohibited Activities
items: Use the App for illegal or fraudulent purposes
Copy, modify, distribute, or sell any part of the App
Reverse engineer or decompile the App
Circumvent security features
Use automated systems without permission
Transmit malware or malicious code
Attempt unauthorized access
Interfere with App functionality

intellectualProperty.title: 9. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
The App, including design, code, content, logos, and trademarks, is owned by {{company.name}} and protected by intellectual property laws.

You receive a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license for personal, non-commercial use.

disclaimers.title: 10. Disclaimers
disclaimers.content:
THE APP IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, INCLUDING:
• MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR PARTICULAR PURPOSE
• NON-INFRINGEMENT
• UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE OPERATION
• ACCURACY OF CONTENT

limitation.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content:
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, {{company.name}} SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR:
• ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES
• LOSS OF PROFITS, REVENUE, DATA, OR GOODWILL
• FOOD-RELATED ILLNESS OR HEALTH ISSUES
• DECISIONS BASED ON APP INFORMATION

TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT PAID IN THE 12 MONTHS PRECEDING THE CLAIM, OR ${{legal.liabilityCapUSD}} USD, WHICHEVER IS GREATER.

indemnification.title: 12. Indemnification
indemnification.content:
You agree to indemnify {{company.name}} from claims arising from:
• Your use of the App
• Your violation of these Terms
• Your violation of third-party rights

termination.title: 13. Termination
termination.content:
We may terminate your account for Terms violations or at our discretion.

You may terminate through App settings.

Upon termination, your license ends immediately.

governing.title: 14. Governing Law
governing.content:
These Terms are governed by the laws of the {{legal.governingLaw}}.

Disputes shall be resolved in the competent courts of {{address.jurisdiction}}.

severability.title: 15. Severability
severability.content: If any provision is found invalid, the remaining provisions remain in effect.

meta.description: Understand the device permissions WiseNest requests and how {{company.name}} uses them.

introduction.title: 1. About App Permissions
introduction.content:
This page explains the device permissions WiseNest may request, why they are needed, and how we use them.

We follow the principle of minimal permissions - we only request access necessary for specific features. You can grant, deny, or revoke permissions at any time through your device settings.

camera.title: 2. Camera Permission (Optional)
items: Barcode Scanning: Scan product barcodes for quick item entry.
Photo Capture: Take photos of food items for visual identification.
Receipt Scanning: Capture receipts to add purchased items (Premium).

cameraDetails.title: Camera Details
cameraDetails.content:
• Access Type: On-demand only (when you use scanning features)
• Data Handling: Photos processed locally; barcode data sent to servers for product info
• No Background Access: Never accessed in background
• Alternatives: Manual entry available without camera

notifications.title: 3. Notifications (Optional)
items: Expiry Alerts: Notifications when food approaches expiry.
Shopping Reminders: Reminders about shopping list items.
Family Updates: Updates when family members modify shared items.
App Updates: Important feature announcements.

notificationDetails.title: Notification Controls
notificationDetails.content:
You have granular control:
• Category Settings: Enable/disable specific types in App settings
• Quiet Hours: Set do-not-disturb periods
• Frequency: Adjust notification frequency

No marketing notifications without consent.

storage.title: 4. Storage Permission
items: Local Database: Store inventory data for offline access.
Image Caching: Save photos for offline viewing.
App Preferences: Store settings and customizations.
Export/Import: Allow data export or import.

storageDetails.title: Storage Details
storageDetails.content:
• iOS: App-sandboxed storage (no explicit permission needed)
• Android: Scoped storage on Android 10+
• Encryption: Sensitive data encrypted at rest
• No Access: We don't access your photos, downloads, or other files

network.title: 5. Internet Access (Required)
items: Account Sync: Synchronize data across devices (Premium).
Cloud Backup: Automatic data backup.
Product Database: Look up product information.
Recipe Suggestions: Fetch AI-generated recipes.
Authentication: Verify identity when signing in.

networkDetails.title: Network Details
networkDetails.content:
• Data Efficiency: Minimized through efficient syncing
• Offline Mode: Core features work offline
• HTTPS Only: All communications encrypted

optional.title: 6. Optional vs Required
optional.content:
Required Permissions:
• Storage: For storing inventory data
• Internet: For authentication and core features

Optional Permissions:
• Camera: For barcode scanning
• Notifications: For expiry alerts

managing.title: 7. Managing Permissions
managing.content:
iOS: Settings > Privacy & Security > [Permission] > WiseNest
Or: Settings > WiseNest > Permissions

Android: Settings > Apps > WiseNest > Permissions

Changes take effect immediately.

meta.description: Review the subscription terms for WiseNest Premium by {{company.name}}.

introduction.title: 1. About WiseNest Premium
introduction.content:
WiseNest Premium unlocks advanced features:
• Unlimited item tracking
• Cloud sync across devices
• Advanced expiry notifications
• AI-powered recipe suggestions
• Family sharing
• Priority support
• Ad-free experience

plans.title: 2. Subscription Plans
items: Weekly: Billed every 7 days
Monthly: Billed every 30 days
3 Months: Billed every 3 months (Save ~10%)
6 Months: Billed every 6 months (Save ~25%)
Annual: Billed every 12 months (Save ~60% - Best Value)

pricing.title: 3. Pricing
pricing.content:
• Prices displayed in your local currency
• Prices may vary by region
• Prices include applicable taxes
• Current prices shown before purchase confirmation

billing.title: 4. Billing and Payment
items: Apple App Store: Charged to your Apple ID account.
Google Play Store: Charged to your Google Play account.
Auto-Renewal: Renews automatically unless cancelled 24 hours before period ends.
Renewal Charge: Charged within 24 hours prior to period end.

freeTrials.title: 5. Free Trials
freeTrials.content:
Free trials may be offered:
• Full Premium access during trial
• Subscription begins automatically if not cancelled
• Eligibility determined by Apple/Google
• Unused trial portions forfeited upon purchasing

cancellation.title: 6. Cancellation
cancellation.content:
Cancel anytime:

iOS: Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions > WiseNest > Cancel
Android: Google Play Store > Menu > Subscriptions > WiseNest > Cancel

After cancellation:
• Premium access continues until period ends
• Data remains intact
• Re-subscribe anytime

refunds.title: 7. Refunds
refunds.content:
Refunds handled by app stores:

iOS: reportaproblem.apple.com
Android: Google Play Support

{{company.name}} cannot process refunds directly.

featureChanges.title: 8. Feature Changes
featureChanges.content:
We continuously improve:
• New features added at no additional cost
• Existing features may be improved
• Significant changes communicated in advance

priceChanges.title: 9. Price Changes
priceChanges.content:
Prices may be adjusted:
• 30 days advance notice before increases
• Current rate continues until next renewal
• Cancel before new price takes effect

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content:
Premium may be terminated:
• By You: Cancel as described in Section 6
• By Us: For Terms violations

Upon termination, Premium features become unavailable but data remains accessible.

meta.description: Important disclaimers for using WiseNest application by {{company.name}}.

general.title: 1. General Disclaimer
general.content:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY.

WiseNest is provided for general informational and convenience purposes only. While {{company.name}} strives for accuracy and reliability, we make no representations or warranties about completeness, accuracy, reliability, or suitability of information.

Any reliance you place on such information is strictly at your own risk.

noWarranty.title: 2. No Warranty
noWarranty.content:
WiseNest is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without any warranties, including:
• MERCHANTABILITY
• FITNESS FOR PARTICULAR PURPOSE
• NON-INFRINGEMENT
• ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS
• UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE SERVICE

foodSafety.title: 3. Food Safety Disclaimer
foodSafety.content: CRITICAL NOTICE: WiseNest is a convenience tool only. It is NOT a substitute for proper food safety knowledge or professional guidance.
items: Expiry Dates Are Estimates: Based on your input and general guidelines. May not reflect actual food safety.
Multiple Factors Affect Safety: Storage temperature, handling, packaging, and initial quality.
Always Inspect Food: Visually inspect, check odors, and assess texture before consuming.
When In Doubt, Throw It Out: Do not consume if you have any doubt.
No Liability for Illness: We are NOT responsible for foodborne illness, allergic reactions, or health issues.
Consult Authorities: For food safety guidance, consult your local health department.

aiSuggestions.title: 4. AI Suggestions Disclaimer
aiSuggestions.content:
AI-generated suggestions may contain errors:
• Not Nutritional Advice: Not professional dietary or medical advice
• Allergies: Always verify ingredients for allergens
• No Guarantee: Results depend on ingredients and techniques

Consult healthcare providers for dietary advice.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Content
thirdParty.content:
The App may contain links to third-party sites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for:
• Content or accuracy of third-party sites
• Privacy policies of third-party sites
• Products or services offered

Access third-party sites at your own risk.

dataAccuracy.title: 6. Data Accuracy
dataAccuracy.content:
While we strive for accuracy:
• Product Information: From third-party databases, may contain errors
• User Input: Accuracy depends on information you enter
• Regional Variations: Product formulations may vary

limitation.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content:
TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, {{company.name}} SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR:
• Any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential damages
• Loss of profits, revenue, data, or goodwill
• Food-related illness or health issues
• Decisions based on App information

This applies regardless of legal theory.

indemnification.title: 8. Indemnification
indemnification.content:
You agree to indemnify {{company.name}} from claims arising from:
• Your use of the App
• Your violation of Terms
• Your violation of third-party rights
• Food safety incidents related to tracked items

jurisdictionalLimitations.title: 9. Jurisdictional Limitations
jurisdictionalLimitations.content:
Some jurisdictions don't allow limitation of certain warranties. In such cases, our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

Consumer rights under applicable law may not be waived.

professionalAdvice.title: 10. Not Professional Advice
professionalAdvice.content:
The App does not constitute:
• Medical, health, or nutritional advice
• Financial or legal advice
• Professional food safety guidance

Seek qualified professional advice when needed.

changes.title: 11. Changes
changes.content: We may modify this Disclaimer at any time. Changes effective immediately upon posting. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: 12. Contact

meta.title: Privacy Policy — {{company.name}}
meta.description: Learn how {{company.name}} collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal data across our platform and products.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content:
This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how {{company.name}} ("Company", "we", "us", "our") collects, uses, processes, stores, shares, and protects your personal information when you visit our website insight.ai.vn ("Website") and use any products, applications, or services provided by {{company.name}} (collectively, "Services").

By accessing the Website or using our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to this Policy in its entirety. If you do not agree, please discontinue use of our Services.

This Policy complies with Vietnam's Personal Data Protection Decree (13/2023/ND-CP), the Cybersecurity Law 2018, the Electronic Transactions Law 2023, the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), and other applicable international data protection laws where relevant.

dataController.title: 2. Data Controller

scope.title: 3. Scope of Application
items: The website insight.ai.vn and all its subpages
All mobile applications developed and distributed by {{company.name}} (including but not limited to: WiseNest, and future products)
All related online services, APIs, and tools
All forms of communication between you and {{company.name}} (email, contact forms, social media)
Individual products may have supplementary privacy policies specific to that product, which take precedence within the scope of the respective product

informationWeCollect.title: 4. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect the following types of information:
items: Personal Identification Information: Full name, email address, phone number (if provided), profile photo, and authentication data from social login providers (Google, Apple, Facebook).
Device Information: Device model, operating system, app version, unique device identifiers, system language, timezone.
Usage Data: Usage frequency, features accessed, session duration, in-app actions, preference settings.
User Content: Data you enter into our products (e.g., food items, shopping lists, personal notes).
Transaction Information: Subscription status, transaction IDs, purchase history. Credit card/payment details are NOT stored by us — they are processed entirely by Apple/Google.
Technical Data: IP address, browser type, internet service provider, referring/exit pages, timestamps.
Location Information: General country/region only for localization purposes. We do NOT collect precise GPS location.
Communication Data: Support email content, feedback, and attachments you voluntarily send to us.

howWeUse.title: 5. Purposes of Information Use
howWeUse.content: We use collected information for the following purposes:
items: Service Provision: Operating, maintaining, and improving our products and features.
Personalization: Customizing user experience and suggesting relevant content.
Data Synchronization: Syncing data across devices for registered users.
Notifications: Sending service notifications, security alerts, and product information.
Customer Support: Responding to inquiries, handling complaints, providing technical support.
Analytics & Improvement: Analyzing usage trends, detecting bugs, improving products.
Security: Detecting and preventing fraud, abuse, and security threats.
Legal Compliance: Meeting legal, regulatory, and law enforcement requirements.
Marketing (only with consent): Sending information about new products, promotions — you may unsubscribe at any time.

legalBasis.title: 6. Legal Basis for Data Processing
legalBasis.content: We process personal data based on the following legal grounds:
items: Consent: You have provided explicit consent for processing (Article 11, Decree 13/2023/ND-CP).
Contractual Performance: Processing necessary to provide services under the agreement between you and us.
Legitimate Interests: Improving services, ensuring security, preventing fraud — balanced against your rights.
Legal Obligation: Compliance with Vietnamese law and applicable international regulations.
Vital Interests: In emergency situations involving your safety.

dataStorage.title: 7. Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:

• Encryption: TLS 1.3 for data in transit, AES-256 for data at rest.
• Access Control: Principle of least privilege — only authorized personnel may access personal data.
• Storage: Data is stored on reputable cloud services (including but not limited to: Google Cloud Platform, Azure) in data centers meeting ISO 27001 standards.
• Security Audits: Regular security assessments and vulnerability testing.
• Monitoring: 24/7 monitoring systems to detect anomalous access.

While we make every effort to protect your data, no method of internet transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention Period
dataRetention.content: We retain personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Policy:
items: Active Accounts: Data is retained throughout the active life of the account.
After Account Deletion: Personal data is deleted within 30 days of an account deletion request.
Backups: Retained for up to 90 days for disaster recovery purposes.
Transaction Data: Retained as required by accounting and tax law (minimum 5 years under Vietnamese Accounting Law).
Legal Data: May be retained longer if required by law or to resolve disputes.
Anonymized Data: Fully anonymized data may be retained indefinitely for statistical analysis.

sharing.title: 9. Data Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do NOT sell, rent, or commercially trade your personal information. We may share data with:
items: Service Providers: Third parties assisting in service operations (cloud hosting, analytics, payment processing) — bound by confidentiality and data processing agreements.
Analytics Partners: Anonymized data for usage analysis (Google Analytics, Firebase Analytics).
Law Enforcement: When required by legitimate requests from competent government authorities, court orders, or legal obligations.
Rights Protection: When necessary to protect the rights, property, or safety of {{company.name}}, our users, or the public.
Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or restructuring — you will be notified in advance.
With Consent: When you explicitly agree to specific sharing.

internationalTransfer.title: 10. Cross-Border Data Transfers
internationalTransfer.content:
Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside Vietnam (including the United States, Singapore, EU). We ensure:

• Compliance with Article 26, Decree 13/2023/ND-CP on cross-border personal data transfers.
• Application of Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) with data recipients.
• Technical and legal safeguards equivalent to or exceeding Vietnamese law requirements.
• Data transfer impact assessments where necessary.

yourRights.title: 11. Data Subject Rights
yourRights.content: Under Vietnamese law (Decree 13/2023/ND-CP) and international regulations, you have the following rights:
items: Right to Know: To be informed about the processing of your personal data, unless otherwise provided by law.
Right to Consent: To consent or decline consent for data processing, unless otherwise provided by law.
Right of Access: To request a copy of your personal data.
Right to Withdraw Consent: To withdraw previously given consent at any time.
Right to Erasure: To request deletion of your personal data, unless retention is required by law.
Right to Restrict Processing: To request limitation of data processing scope.
Right to Data Portability: To receive your data in a machine-readable format.
Right to Object: To object to data processing in certain circumstances.
Right to Complain: To file complaints with the Ministry of Public Security (the designated data protection authority in Vietnam) or the data protection authority in your jurisdiction.
Right to Compensation: To claim damages when data is processed in violation of regulations.
Right to Self-Protection: To self-protect according to legal provisions upon discovering data processing violations.

exercisingRights.title: 12. Exercising Your Rights
exercisingRights.content:
To exercise any of your rights, please contact {{email.privacy}}.

We will:
• Verify your identity before processing requests
• Respond within 72 hours of receiving the request
• Complete processing within 30 days (may extend by an additional 30 days for complex requests, with notification)
• Process the first request free of charge within each 12-month period

You may also:
• Export your data through account settings in the app
• Delete your account through app settings
• Manage notification and privacy preferences within the app

children.title: 13. Children's Protection
children.content:
Our Services are not intended for children under 13 years of age (or under 16 in the EU/EEA). We do not knowingly collect information from children below this age.

For users aged 13 to 16, parental or legal guardian consent is required.

In Vietnam, under Decree 13/2023/ND-CP, processing personal data of children (under 16) always requires parental or guardian consent.

If you discover that a child has provided personal information without appropriate consent, please contact {{email.privacy}} immediately.

cookies.title: 14. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
The Website may use:

• Essential Cookies: Required for basic functionality (login sessions, language preferences).
• Analytics Cookies: To understand how you use the Website (Google Analytics — anonymized data).
• Preference Cookies: To remember your display preferences.

Mobile apps may use:
• Device Identifiers: For anonymous analytics.
• Local Storage: Preferences and cached data.
• Analytics SDKs: Firebase Analytics (anonymized data).

You may manage cookies through your browser settings. Disabling essential cookies may affect Website functionality.

thirdPartyLinks.title: 15. Third-Party Links and Services
thirdPartyLinks.content: The Website and Apps may contain links to third-party services. We do not control and are not responsible for the privacy practices of third parties. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of all third-party services before providing personal information.

dataBreach.title: 16. Data Breach Response
dataBreach.content:
In the event of a personal data breach, we will:

• Notify the competent authority (Ministry of Public Security) within 72 hours of discovery, in compliance with Article 23 of Decree 13/2023/ND-CP.
• Notify affected data subjects without undue delay.
• Document breach details, consequences, and remedial measures taken.
• Implement technical measures to mitigate impact and prevent recurrence.

changes.title: 17. Policy Changes
changes.content:
We may update this Policy from time to time. Any material changes will be communicated via:

• Notices on the Website
• Email (if you have subscribed)
• In-app notifications

The "Last updated" date at the top of this page reflects the current version. Continued use of the Services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Policy. For material changes, we will seek explicit consent where required.

contact.title: 18. Contact

meta.title: Terms of Service — {{company.name}}
meta.description: Terms and conditions for using the website and services of {{company.name}}.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By accessing our website insight.ai.vn ("Website") or using any products, applications, or services provided by {{company.name}} ("Company", "we", "us", "our") (collectively, "Services"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"), our Privacy Policy, and any supplemental terms applicable to specific products.

These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and {{company.name}} under Vietnamese law.

IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH THESE TERMS, PLEASE DO NOT USE THE SERVICES.

We may modify these Terms at any time. The updated version takes effect upon posting, unless otherwise specified. Continued use constitutes acceptance of changes.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.content:
To use the Services, you must:
• Be at least 13 years old (or 16 in the EU/EEA; in Vietnam, persons under 16 require parental or guardian consent)
• Have legal capacity to enter into binding agreements under the Civil Code 2015
• Not be prohibited from using the Services under applicable law in your country of residence
• Not have been previously suspended or terminated by {{company.name}}

accountRegistration.title: 3. Account Registration
accountRegistration.content: By creating an account, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate, complete, and current information
Maintain and update your information when changes occur
Keep your login credentials confidential and not share them with anyone
Use secure authentication methods
Immediately notify {{company.name}} upon discovering unauthorized access or security breaches
Accept full responsibility for all activity under your account
Not create multiple accounts for purposes of abuse or fraud

serviceDescription.title: 4. Service Description
serviceDescription.content:
{{company.name}} provides a smart app platform including but not limited to:

• Home management and lifestyle applications
• Personal finance tools
• Entertainment and educational applications
• Related digital services

Services may include a free tier with basic features and paid subscriptions (Premium) with advanced features. Feature details may change over time.

Services are provided for personal, non-commercial use, unless otherwise agreed in writing.

subscriptions.title: 5. Paid Subscriptions and Payments
subscriptions.content: Premium features are available through paid subscriptions:
items: Payments are processed via the Apple App Store or Google Play Store
Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the renewal date
Prices are displayed in local currency and may vary by region
Prices may be adjusted with 30 days' advance notice
Refunds are handled under the policies of the respective app store
{{company.name}} does not directly collect or store payment information

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
All content, design, source code, logos, trademarks, trade names, and other intellectual property related to the Services are the exclusive property of {{company.name}} or its licensors, protected by the Intellectual Property Law 2005 (amended 2009, 2019, 2022) and international treaties to which Vietnam is a party.

You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the Services for personal, non-commercial purposes.

You may NOT: copy, modify, distribute, resell, sublicense, rent, disassemble, reverse engineer, or create derivative works from any part of the Services without written consent.

userContent.title: 7. User Content
userContent.content:
You retain full ownership of content you create through the Services ("User Content"). You grant {{company.name}} a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, transferable license to:

• Store, process, and display Content to provide the Services
• Create backups for data protection
• Analyze anonymized data to improve the Services

This license automatically terminates when you delete the Content or your account.

You warrant that your User Content does not violate applicable laws, third-party rights, or these Terms.

prohibited.title: 8. Prohibited Activities
items: Use the Services for unlawful, fraudulent purposes or in violation of third-party rights
Transmit content that violates Vietnamese law: opposing the state, inciting violence, pornography, discrimination, or other harmful content (Article 16, Cybersecurity Law 2018)
Copy, modify, reverse engineer, decompile, or distribute any part of the Services
Disable, interfere with, or sabotage security features
Use bots, crawlers, scrapers, or other automated systems without permission
Transmit viruses, malware, or harmful software
Attempt unauthorized access to systems, data, or other users' accounts
Interfere with normal Services performance or functionality
Use the Services to collect personal information of other users without consent
Impersonate any person or organization

disclaimers.title: 9. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimers.content:
THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO:

• WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE
• WARRANTIES OF ACCURACY, COMPLETENESS, OR RELIABILITY
• WARRANTIES OF UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE, OR ERROR-FREE OPERATION
• WARRANTIES OF NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD-PARTY RIGHTS

Note: Under the Consumer Protection Law 2023, certain consumer rights in Vietnam cannot be waived.

limitation.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content:
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, {{company.name}} AND ITS DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AND PARTNERS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR:

• ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES
• LOSS OF PROFITS, REVENUE, DATA, GOODWILL, OR BUSINESS OPPORTUNITY
• COST OF PROCURING SUBSTITUTE SERVICES
• DECISIONS OR ACTIONS BASED ON INFORMATION FROM THE SERVICES

TOTAL MAXIMUM LIABILITY OF {{company.name}} SHALL NOT EXCEED THE TOTAL AMOUNT YOU HAVE PAID FOR THE SERVICES IN THE 12 MONTHS PRECEDING THE CLAIM, OR $100 USD, WHICHEVER IS GREATER.

This limitation applies regardless of legal theory and even if {{company.name}} has been advised of the possibility of such damages.

Note: Liability limitations may be subject to mandatory consumer protection regulations in Vietnam.

indemnification.title: 11. Indemnification
indemnification.content:
You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless {{company.name}} from all claims, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including reasonable attorney fees) arising from:

• Your use of the Services
• Your breach of these Terms
• Your violation of law or third-party rights
• User Content you submit

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
governingLaw.content:
These Terms are governed by the laws of the {{legal.governingLaw}}.

The parties shall first attempt to resolve disputes through negotiation and mediation. If unresolved within 30 days, disputes shall be submitted to the competent People's Court in {{address.jurisdiction}}.

For EU/EEA users, you may use the European Commission's Online Dispute Resolution (ODR) platform at https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr.

For users in other jurisdictions, mandatory local consumer protection laws remain applicable.

termination.title: 13. Termination
termination.content:
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account and access if:

• You violate these Terms
• Required by law or competent authorities
• Fraudulent, abusive, or security-threatening behavior is detected
• At our reasonable discretion to protect the Services and other users

You may terminate your account at any time through app settings or by contacting {{email.support}}.

Upon termination:
• Your license to use the Services ends immediately
• Paid subscriptions will not auto-renew (you must cancel through the app store)
• Data will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy

forceM.title: 14. Force Majeure
forceM.content: {{company.name}} shall not be liable for failure to perform or delay in performing the Services due to events beyond reasonable control, including but not limited to: natural disasters, war, terrorism, epidemics, strikes, internet outages, changes in law, or acts of third parties.

severability.title: 15. Severability and Entirety
severability.content:
If any provision of these Terms is found by a court or competent authority to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect. The invalid provision shall be replaced by a valid provision closest in meaning.

These Terms, together with the Privacy Policy and product-specific terms, constitute the entire agreement between you and {{company.name}}.

contact.title: 16. Contact
